sentence.text: In a bone metastasis model, apoptotic process treated with ZOL+US had osteolytic lesions that were 58% smaller than those of ZOL-treated animals as well as a reduced skeletal tumor burden.

Additionally, US forced the penetration of ZOL within tumors, as demonstrated by the intratumoral accumulation of unprenylated regulation of neurotransmitter receptor localization to postsynaptic specialization membrane, a surrogate marker of ZOL antitumor activity.

entity.text: regulation of neurotransmitter receptor localization to postsynaptic specialization membrane
